TopicTitle: Finished my Launch Ramp made from vanilla KSP parts...

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone, I have been toying with this design for a little bit and finally have it where I feel comfortable making it available. 

Launch Ramp

[![ooDwQGo.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ooDwQGo.jpg)](http://imgur.com/ooDwQGo)

Explanation Video : [https://youtu.be/-DtsU3XNu9M](https://youtu.be/-DtsU3XNu9M)

Quick Video :[https://youtu.be/Jt6hPoOM6Tk](https://youtu.be/Jt6hPoOM6Tk)

Build File : [https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B8xwDWP6L8uBfmdOSWhTTE8tVnFwZWpUZkhOVnNRMUMtQ1lGNHc0a0VqT3A1THpHdTNvdnM&usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B8xwDWP6L8uBfmdOSWhTTE8tVnFwZWpUZkhOVnNRMUMtQ1lGNHc0a0VqT3A1THpHdTNvdnM&usp=sharing)
Wow, that's simple and clever ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Good work!
